class.name: BlipKitBytecode
class.brief_description: A [Resource] used to save byte code gererated with [BlipKitAssembler].

method.name: get_code_section_offset
method.description: Returns the byte offset of the code section.

method.name: get_code_section_size
method.description: Returns the size in bytes the code section.

method.name: get_error_message
method.description: Returns the error message when loading the byte code fails.

method.name: get_label_name
method.description: Returns the label name for the label with index [param label_index].

method.name: get_label_position
method.description: Returns the byte position for the label with index [param label_index].

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the byte code is valid. Returns [code]false[/code] if the byte code is not valid. In this case, [method get_status] returns the status and [method get_error_message] returns the error message.

constants.constant: The byte code is loaded successfully.
The byte code is not valid.
The byte code version is not supported.
The current supported byte code version.
